answer:
Michael Crabtree is an American football wide receiver who is currently a free agent. He played college football at Texas Tech, where he was a consensus All-American and won the Biletnikoff Award as the nation's top receiver in 2007. He was drafted by the San Francisco 49ers in the first round of the 2009 NFL Draft.

Crabtree has played for the 49ers, Oakland Raiders, and Baltimore Ravens. He has been selected to the Pro Bowl three times and has won a Super Bowl with the 49ers in 2013.
